column1: PROPOSE_BEST_FRIENDSHIP_NOTIFICATION0:"[recipient.GetFirstNameNoTooltip], my [recipient.Custom('SisterBrother')], my companion, my confidante — will you join me in declaring our friendship to be the truest and brightest in all the world, with all the debts of loyalty that that entails?"
